page.title: 04GAMES AT HOME AND SCHOOL
page.content: {Electronic games The most popular hand held electronic game is Space Invaders. You are a little space-ship.Who has to fire at all these other space-ships above you.If you hit one you get a certain number of points.The space-ships above you can fire as well.If they hit you,you lose a life.You have 3 lifes altogether. { {Bulldog You need 2 semi-circles where everyone goes to.You choose someone to be 'on it'.You have to get from one semi circle to another without being tug by the person who is 'on it'.If you get tug you are 'on it' with the person who tug you.When everyone has been tug you can start again.The first person caught is 'on it' for the next game.
